Large greatsword +4 melee (3d6+3/19–20) or Large javelin +0 ranged (1d8+2)
Fire acclimated, giant’s stature, low-light vision
Str 15, Dex 9, Con 14, Int 10, Wis 9, Cha 8

Team (2–4), squad (11–20 plus 2 3rd-level sergeants and 1 leader of 3rd–6th level), or band (30–100 plus
            150% noncombatants plus 1 3rd-level sergeant per 10 adults, 5 5th-level lieutenants, and 3 7th-level
            captains)
